[h1] CS:GO is a [strike] fun[/strike] and challenging game. [/h1]
You can play many different [i] war games [/i] but most of your playtime is spent raging in [b] competitive matchmaking [/b]. This so called [i] comp [/i] is basically a Free-for-all match where the enemy team calls you a hacker and your teammates call you an idiot. The goal of the game is to fight 5 enemies and 4 teammates while also trying to win. It is also physically impossible to play a game without a Russian in it.

You can always improve something in your game and slowly climb the ranks to the desired [b] Global Elite[/b]. However, you will probably never get there and just stay in silver like most of us.
[hr][/hr]
The game is like my ex: it hurts me and makes me angry but I keep going back because sometimes it [i] almost [/i] makes me feel good.
[h1] Absolutely recommend![/h1]
Good game, but here is lot of cheaters.
